Package nl.han.ica.oopg.persistence

Class FilePersistence

java.lang.Object
nl.han.ica.oopg.persistence.FilePersistence
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPersistence
public class FilePersistence
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPersistence
Class for user persistence. With this Class you can save Strings in a File to your internal storage. Both real devices and emulators can use the internal storage.

You can use the game persistance for example to save variables or, highscores. You are allowed to use multiple game persistances, each additional persistance saves an additional file on your system if the filename name is different.

  • Constructor Summary

    FilePersistence​(java.lang.String filename)
    The constructor allows you to specify the filename the internal storage will use.

  • Constructor Details

    • FilePersistence

      public FilePersistence​(java.lang.String filename)
      The constructor allows you to specify the filename the internal storage will use.
      Parameters:
      filename - The name of the file that will be used for this persistance

  • Method Details

    • saveData

      public void saveData​(java.lang.String data)
      Saves the data to the earlier specified file. All previous saved data will be overwritten. You can get your previous data by loading it first and then appending your new data to the String.
      Specified by:
      saveData in interface IPersistence
      Parameters:
      data - The data that should be saved to the file, the data must be one entire String

    • saveData

      public void saveData​(java.lang.String[] data, java.lang.String separator)
      Specified by:
      saveData in interface IPersistence
      Parameters:
      data - The data to be stored
      separator - The separator being used

    • loadDataString

      public java.lang.String loadDataString()
      Returns the full data (in String format) that is stored in the file. This function will return the data or an empty String if the file does not exist, or the file is empty.
      Specified by:
      loadDataString in interface IPersistence
      Returns:
      String The data saved earlier.

    • loadDataStringArray

      public java.lang.String[] loadDataStringArray​(java.lang.String separator)
      Specified by:
      loadDataStringArray in interface IPersistence
      Parameters:
      separator - The specific String which is used to separate the String from the earlier specified file.
      Returns:
      The generated Array made out of the String from the earlier specified file.

    • deleteData

      public void deleteData()
      This function deletes the earlier specified file.

    • fileExists

      public boolean fileExists()
      This function checks if the earlier specified file exists.
      Specified by:
      fileExists in interface IPersistence
      Returns:
      Boolean with the result.
